Literature.Title: Purification and Characterization of Plantaricin LPL-1, a Novel Class IIa Bacteriocin Produced by Lactobacillus plantarum LPL-1 Isolated From Fermented Fish.
Literature.Author: Wang Y, Qin Y, Xie Q, Zhang Y, Hu J, Li P

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Listeria monocytogenes NICPBP 54002(MIC=16µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 19113(MIC=16µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 19114(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 13565(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus CVCC 26112(MIC=32µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis(MIC=32µg/ml),Lactobacillus delbrueckii subsp. lactis(MIC=16µg/ml),Lactiplantibacillus plantarum(MIC=16µg/ml),Lactobacillus delbrueckii subsp. bulgaricus(MIC=16µg/ml),Ligilactobacillus salivarius(MIC=16µg/ml),Lactococcus lactis MG1363(MIC=16µg/ml),Bacillus amyloliquefaciens(MIC=32µg/ml),Bacillus pumilus(MIC=32µg/ml),Escherichia coli DH5alpha(no activity data),Escherichia coli BL21(no activity data),Escherichia coli BW25113(no activity data),Escherichia coli JM109(no activity data),Saccharomyces cerevisiae(no activity data),Pichia pastoris GS115(no activity data)
